title: KinkyGeeks - Erste Hilfe - Kinky Edition
description:
First aid lesson for kinky people
There is an extra registration for the workshop needed at https://ticket.kinkygeeks.de We need to do this because of the large number of people that want to attend. We have only limited room and we would like to not handle a huge crowd control again.First Aid is good, useful and quite generic. Let's close the gap between the overall topic and the kinky specifics.During the workshop we will not skip the thought, that something might go wrong. Instead, we talk about how to handle these situations.Please note, that the workshop is in german language only.Erste Hilfe ist gut, nützlich und ziemlich allgemein. Lasst uns über die Dinge zwischen dem Allgemeinen und den Kinky Besonderheiten sprechen.Dabei weichen wir dem Gedanken nicht aus, dass mal etwas schiefgehen kann, sondern überlegen uns, wie wir mit solchen Situationen umgehen können.
